category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_PKI_user_validation_fieldname
preference.preference_description: Defines the fieldname from the client certificate to be used for user authentication. Accepts a single string as a value. The string must be a valid field name from the client certificate. For example, the valid values in the Siemens PKI certificate are SERIALNUMBER, CN(Common name), SN(Surname), G(Given name) and O(Orgnaization name) Default value is "NONE". By default, the authentication is performed using client certificate.
